name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients:
200g spaghetti 
2 large eggs 
100g pecorino cheese 
100g guanciale or pancetta 
Salt and black pepper to taste
description: Spaghetti carbonara is a classic Roman pasta dish. The original recipe uses guanciale, pecorino cheese, eggs, and black pepper.
instructions:
Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente. 
In a separate pan, sauté the guanciale or pancetta until crispy. 
In a bowl, mix eggs, grated pecorino cheese, and black pepper. 
Drain the cooked spaghetti and toss it with the egg and cheese mixture. 
Add the crispy guanciale or pancetta. 
Serve immediately with an extra sprinkle of cheese and pepper.

name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients:
2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts 
8 oz fettuccine pasta 
1 cup heavy cream 
1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
2 tablespoons butter 
Salt and black pepper to taste
description: Chicken Alfredo is a creamy Italian-American pasta dish. It features tender chicken and a rich Alfredo sauce.
instructions:
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then cook them in a pan until no longer pink. 
In another pan, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant. 
Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan cheese. 
Cook until the sauce thickens. 
Cook fettuccine pasta according to the package instructions. 
Slice the cooked chicken and add it to the sauce. 
Serve the chicken Alfredo over the cooked fettuccine.

name: Scrambled Eggs
ingredients:
4 large eggs 
2 tablespoons milk 
Salt and black pepper to taste 
2 tablespoons butter
description: Scrambled eggs are a classic breakfast dish made with eggs, milk, and seasonings.
instructions:
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. 
Melt butter in a pan over medium heat. 
Pour the egg mixture into the pan. 
Cook, stirring, until the eggs are set but still moist. 
Serve hot.

name: Caesar Salad
ingredients:
1 head of Romaine lettuce 
1/4 cup Caesar dressing 
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese 
1 cup croutons
description: Caesar salad is a classic lunch dish featuring crisp lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions:
Wash and chop the Romaine lettuce. 
 In a large bowl, toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, and croutons. 
Serve immediately.
